content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "初期ターンの索敵作戦を立案します。敵空母は(3,3)近傍のランダム位置に存在すると想定されるため、北東方向に航空部隊を発艦して広範囲を索敵する戦略を取ります。現在の空母位置(21,14)から、最大航続距離を考慮し、BSQ1を(10,5)方面に発艦させます。これにより、敵空母の存在可能性が高いエリアを効率的に索敵できると判断しました。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (10, 5) while at (20, 13).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 13), outbound toward (10, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は現在(20,13)から(10,5)に向けて飛行中です。この経路は敵空母が存在する可能性が高いエリアを横断しており、効果的な索敵が期待できます。次のターンは、BSQ2も別の方向から索敵を行い、より広範囲をカバーする作戦を立案します。BSQ2は南東方向の(15,25)付近を目標に発艦させ、マップの広い範囲を効率的に索敵します。空母BC1は現在位置で静止し、航空部隊の索敵結果を待ちます。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 15, "y": 25}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 9) while at (18, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (15, 25) while at (20, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 9) (previously at (13, 9)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 10), outbound toward (10, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (20, 15), outbound toward (15, 25), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重要な展開が発生しました。BSQ1が敵航空部隊ASQ1を(13, 9)で発見しました。これは敵空母の近くに敵航空部隊が存在することを示唆しています。現在の索敵戦略を即座に修正し、敵空母の位置を特定する必要があります。BSQ1は現在(18, 10)にいるため、発見した敵航空部隊の方向である(13, 9)付近を詳細に索敵します。BSQ2は(15, 25)への飛行を継続し、広範囲の索敵を維持します。敵空母は(13, 9)の周辺に存在する可能性が高いと推測します。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 13, "y": 9}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "エラーが発生しました。現在、BSQ1とBSQ2は既に発艦済みで、空母には航空部隊が残っていないため、新たな発艦ができません。現状では、既に発艦している航空部隊の動きを注視し、敵空母の位置を特定する必要があります。BSQ1は(13, 9)付近で敵航空部隊ASQ1を発見しており、この情報から敵空母の位置を推測する重要な手がかりとなります。次のターンは、BSQ1とBSQ2の現在の飛行経路と索敵結果を慎重に分析し、敵空母の位置を特定する戦略を立てます。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (14, 6) while at (15, 8).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (16, 11) while at (15, 8).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (15, 10) while at (15, 8).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (14, 6) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (16, 11) (previously at (13, 9)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (15, 10) (previously at (13, 7)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 8), outbound toward (14, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 19), outbound toward (15, 25), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重大な進展がありました！BSQ1が敵空母AC1の位置を(14, 6)で特定し、さらに敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2も発見しました。これは絶好の攻撃チャンスです。BSQ1は既に(14, 6)に向かっており、敵空母への攻撃態勢に入っています。現時点で最も重要な戦術は、BSQ1による敵空母への攻撃を全面的にサポートすることです。BSQ2は現在(18, 19)にいるため、即座に攻撃支援のために方向転換する必要があります。敵空母の位置が判明したため、迅速かつ集中的な攻撃で勝機を掴みます。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (17, 12) while at (14, 7).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (19, 13) while at (21, 14).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (17, 13) while at (21, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (16, 6) while at (15, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (15, 7).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (16, 6) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (19, 13) (previously at (13, 9)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (17, 13) (previously at (13, 7)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 7), engaging an enemy target at (16, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (16, 23), outbound toward (15, 25), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1と交戦中です。現在の状況は非常に有利で、敵空母を直接攻撃できる絶好の機会を得ています。BSQ1は(15, 7)から(16, 6)の敵空母を攻撃しており、先制攻撃の効果を期待できます。BC1は静止したままですが、敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2の位置を(19, 13)と(17, 13)で確認しています。BSQ2は現在(16, 23)にいるため、すぐには戦闘に参加できません。現時点では、BSQ1の攻撃結果を注視し、敵空母の状況を確認する必要があります。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (15, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 18 damage while at (15, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (15, 7).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (20, 15) while at (21, 14).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (20, 13) while at (21, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (15, 25).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (16, 6) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 79/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (20, 15) (previously at (13, 9)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (20, 13) (previously at (13, 7)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 7), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 25), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1に対して攻撃を実施し、18ダメージを与えることに成功しました。敵空母のHPは100から79に減少しました。現在、BSQ1とBSQ2は両方とも帰投中です。敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2は、BC1の視界内で(20, 15)と(20, 13)に位置しています。次のターンは、損傷を受けたBSQ1と無傷のBSQ2を空母に帰投させ、補給と再編成を行います。敵空母への最初の攻撃は成功したものの、まだ撃沈には至っていないため、次の攻撃機会を慎重に計画する必要があります。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (21, 14).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 29 damage while at (21, 14).
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ2) while at (21, 14).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ2) causing 30 damage while at (21, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (17, 6) while at (17, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (20, 15) while at (17, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (20, 13) while at (17, 11).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (17, 6) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 79/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (20, 15) (previously at (13, 9)), HP 20/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (20, 13) (previously at (13, 7)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 41/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 11), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 21), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "状況が急速に進展しています。BC1が敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2に対して攻撃を行い、それぞれ29ダメージと30ダメージを与えました。敵航空部隊は大きく損耗し、ASQ1は20/40、ASQ2は26/40のHPまで減少しています。BSQ1は敵空母AC1を(17, 6)で再度発見し、まだ撃沈には至っていません。BC1自体も41/100のHPに減少しており、防御に注意が必要です。現時点での最優先事項は、損傷したBSQ1とBSQ2を安全に帰投させ、空母を修復・再編成することです。敵空母と航空部隊の位置を注視し、次の攻撃機会を慎重に計画します。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (19, 10) while at (21, 14).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 11) while at (21, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 11) while at (20, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 9) while at (20, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (17, 6) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 79/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 11) (previously at (13, 9)), HP 20/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 9) (previously at (13, 7)), HP 26/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 41/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 14), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 17), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2の位置が接近しており、BC1とBSQ1の視界内で確認されています。現在、両航空部隊は損傷を受けており、戦闘能力が低下しています。BSQ1とBSQ2は帰投中で、空母への安全な帰還が最優先です。敵空母AC1は依然として(17, 6)に位置し、HPは79/100を維持しています。次のターンは、損傷した航空部隊を空母に帰還させ、空母BC1の防御と修復に注力します。敵の動きを注視し、再編成後の反撃のチャンスを窺います。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (21, 14).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (19, 10) while at (21, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (21, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (17, 6) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 79/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (19, 10) (previously at (13, 9)), HP 20/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (21, 14), stationary, HP 41/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2が無事に空母BC1に帰還しました。現在、空母のHPは41/100と低下しており、防御と修復が急務です。敵航空部隊ASQ1は(19, 10)に位置し、HPは20/40と大きく損耗しています。敵空母AC1は(17, 6)に位置し、依然としてHPは79/100を維持しています。次の作戦は、損傷した航空部隊BSQ1を修復しつつ、BSQ2を用いて敵空母への攻撃を再開することです。敵航空部隊の位置を考慮し、効果的な攻撃経路を選択します。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 17, "y": 6}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (17, 6) while at (20, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (17, 6) (previously at (13, 6)), HP 79/100.
- No enemy squadrons are currently visible.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 13), outbound toward (17, 6), HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1の最後に確認された位置(17, 6)に向けて飛行中です。現時点で敵航空部隊は視界内に存在せず、攻撃の好機と判断します。BSQ1は損傷しているため(22/40)、慎重に攻撃を進める必要があります。BC1は現在(21, 14)で静止しており、BSQ2は空母内に待機中です。BSQ1の索敵結果を注視し、必要に応じてBSQ2も発艦させ、敵空母への集中攻撃を計画します。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (20, 8) while at (19, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (19, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (20, 8) (previously at (19, 7)), HP 79/100.
- No enemy squadrons are currently visible.

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 9), engaging an enemy target at (20, 8), HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1と交戦中です。現在の位置は(19, 9)で、敵空母は(20, 8)に位置しています。損傷したBSQ1(22/40)が攻撃を行っており、敵空母のHPは依然として79/100のままです。攻撃の成否が戦況を大きく左右する重要な瞬間です。BSQ2は空母内に待機中であり、BSQ1の攻撃結果を注視しています。もし攻撃が不十分であれば、BSQ2を即座に発艦させ、敵空母への集中攻撃を行う準備が必要です。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (19, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 17 damage while at (19, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (19, 9).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (20, 13) while at (21, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (20, 13) while at (19, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (20, 8) (previously at (19, 7)), HP 63/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (20, 13) (previously at (21, 10)), HP 20/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 5/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1に対して再度攻撃を行い、17ダメージを与えました。敵空母のHPは79/100から63/100に減少しました。しかし、BSQ1は大きな損傷を受け、わずか5/40のHPしか残っていません。同時に、敵航空部隊ASQ1が(20, 13)に出現し、HPは20/40です。現状では、損傷の激しいBSQ1を安全に帰還させることが最優先です。BSQ2は無傷であり、次の攻撃に備えて準備を整える必要があります。敵空母への追撃と、残存する敵航空部隊への対処を慎重に計画します。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:

- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 10 damage while at (21, 14).

- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "戦況が急速に変化しています。BC1は敵航空部隊ASQ1に10ダメージを与え、ASQ1のHPを13/40まで減少させました。敵空母AC1は(22, 8)に移動し、依然としてHPは63/100を維持しています。BSQ1は極めて脆弱な状態(5/40 HP)で帰還中であり、即座に空母に戻る必要があります。敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2が近接しており、BC1も損傷(31/100 HP)を受けています。次の攻撃は、無傷のBSQ2を用いて敵空母AC1を攻撃することが最適と判断します。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 22, "y": 8}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

Recent events:
